attributes.action: investigate pricing of low fat food products against full fat food products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a society where obesity is a common occurrance. In order to turn this around we need to make healthier foods more affordable. Looking at the way healthier foods are priced, we seem to be paying more for what is supposedly less of a product due to reduction in fat, salt, sugar and so on.
